activities:
International Medical Group®, Inc. provides international medical insurance products that serve vacationers, serve those working or living abroad for short or extended periods, serve people traveling frequently between countries, and those who maintain multiple countries of residence.  
When these customers make application for our products or file a claim as a result of purchasing one of our products they will be supplying personal information including name, address, country of residence, passport ID, age, gender,  medical history.
Additionally we maintain offices and staff in West Sussex, England,  United Kingdom and Cardiff, England, United Kingdom.  Consequently, human resource information is being transmitted from the UK to the corporate office in the United States.
contacttitle1: Manager, IT Compliance and Production Services
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer
